feed.title: AList Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AList: v3.39.4
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • release: Missing installation of zig  -  by @xhofe (0ba75)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for AList: v3.40.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • security: Generating random string with crypto rand  -  by @Mmx233 in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7525 (12b42)
  • sso: Generate and verify OAuth state with go-cache  -  by @Mmx233 in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7527 (398c0)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • baidu_netdisk: Update fileToObj to use ServerCtime and ServerMtime  -  by @Kuingsmile in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7535 (94915)
  • local: Preserve file owner when copying  -  by @Rirmach in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7528 (25c5e)
  • net: Close of closed channel  -  by @j2rong4cn in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7529 (4c0cf)
  • pikpak&pikpak_share: Captcha_sign error (#7530 close #7481 close #7482)  -  by @Three-taile-dragon in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7530, https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7481 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7482 (2dec7)
  • sso: OIDC compatibility mode  -  by @Mmx233 in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7524 (150dc)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for AList: v3.41.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Ftp server support (#7634 close #1898)  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7634 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/1898 (650b0)
  • Sftp server support  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7643 (33ba7)
  • 139: Support multipart upload (close: #7444)  -  by @xrgzs in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7630 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7444 (016e1)
  • sso: Add custom extra scope support  -  by @baobao1270 in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7577 (08812)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • 115: Fix login bug (#7626 close #7614 close #7620)  -  by @SheltonZhu in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7626, https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7614 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7620 (aa45a)
  • 139: Update APIs (#7591 close #7603)  -  by @xrgzs and @xhofe in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7591 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7603 (a3908)
  • baidu_photo: Cookie login fix download error  -  by @foxxorcat in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7602 (2d360)
  • cloudreve: Support upload to remote and OneDrive storage (#7632 close #6882)  -  by @xrgzs in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7632 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/6882 (2a035)
  • ftp-server: Large transfer leads to client timeout  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7639 (201e2)
  • onedrive: Fix timeout error (#7551 close #7506)  -  by @shing-yu in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7551 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7506 (5084d)
  • pikpak: Remove oauth2 method (#7567 close #7545)  -  by @Three-taile-dragon in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7567 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7545 (fa15c)

   üèé Performance

  • task: Merge requests of operating selected  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7637 (73418)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for AList: v3.42.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Add Reference interface to driver  -  by @j2rong4cn in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7805 (ab22c)
  • alias:
  • Add DownloadConcurrency and DownloadPartSize option  -  by @j2rong4cn in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7829 (2be0c)
  • archive:
  • Archive manage  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7817 (bb40e)
  • ci:
  • Add build info for beta release  -  by @xhofe (226c3)
  • docker release:
  • Improve aria2 image, add aio image  -  by @Mmx233 and @GoodbyeNJN in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7750 (4dce5)
  • fs:
  • Add overwrite option to preventing unintentional overwriting  -  by @Lanfei in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7809 (59e02)
  • Display the existing filename in error message  -  by @Lanfei in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7877 (0d4c6)
  • ftp-server:
  • Treat moving across file systems as copying (#7704 close #7701)  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7704 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7701 (40b0e)
  • Support resumable downloading  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7792 (25b4b)
  • github:
  • Add github api driver  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7717 (e0411)
  • github_releases:
  • Add support for github_releases driver (#7844 close #7842)  -  by @YangRucheng in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7844 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7842 (bdd97)
  • index:
  • Add disable index option for storages  -  by @Lanfei in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7730 (ed149)
  • local:
  • Support both time and percent for video thumbnail  -  by @1024th in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7802 (31a74)
  • misskey:
  • Add misskey driver  -  by @snowykami in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7864 (fd51f)
  • offline-download:
  • Allow using offline download tools in any storage  -  by @Lanfei in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7716 (b60da)
  • patch:
  • Upgrade patch module  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7738 (5994c)
  • recursive-move:
  • Add overwrite option to preventing unintentional overwriting (#7868 closes #7382,#7719)  -  by @Lanfei in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7868, https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7382 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7719 (258b8)
  • s3:
  • Support custom host presign (#7699 close #7696)  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7699 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7696 (221cd)
  • sftp-server:
  • Public key login  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7668 (77d0c)
  • Do not generate host key until first enabled  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7734 (aa108)
  • task:
  • Add speed monitor  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7655 (d7aa1)
  • Attach creator to user of the context  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7729 (6745d)
  • Allow retry canceled  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7852 (d5ec9)
  • thunder:
  • Add offline download tool  -  by @Lanfei in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7673 (42243)
  • upload:
  • Support rapid upload on web  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7851 (5eff8)
  • url-tree:
  • Support url tree driver writing (#7779 close #5166)  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7779 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/5166 (51bcf)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Static page to limit request method (#7745 close #7667)  -  by @j2rong4cn in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7745 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7667 (365fc)
  • Resolve concurrent read/write issues in WrapObjName  -  by @foxxorcat in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7865 (bdcf4)
  • 115:
  • Support float QPS  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7677 (c218b)
  • Fix offline download (#7845 close #7794)  -  by @SheltonZhu in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7845 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7794 (26712)
  • 139:
  • Handle upload file conflicts  -  by @xrgzs in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7692 (bb2ae)
  • Update familyGetFiles pagination logic (#7748 close #7711)  -  by @xrgzs in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7748 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7711 (7fd4a)
  • Use personal_new by default  -  by @xrgzs in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7836 (880cc)
  • Correct path handling in groupGetFiles (#7850 closes #7848,#7603)  -  by @xrgzs in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7850, https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7848 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7603 (cafdb)
  • archive:
  • Unable to preview  -  by @j2rong4cn in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7843 (5c5d8)
  • copy:
  • Use Link and Put when the driver does not support copying  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7834 (11b6a)
  • crypt:
  • Add sign to thumbnail  -  by @j2rong4cn in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/6611 (db5c6)
  • ftp-server:
  • Work unproperly when base url is not root  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7693 (6aaf5)
  • Rewrite download in a more appropriate method  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7656 (b72e8)
  • ilanzou:
  • Add accept-encoding request header (#7796 close #7759)  -  by @Jason-Fly in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7796 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7759 (6812e)
  • lanzou:
  • Missing parameter (#7678 close #7210)  -  by @xrgzs in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7678 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7210 (b8bd1)
  • lenovonas_share:
  • Stoken expire  -  by @YangRucheng in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7727 (040dc)
  • net:
  • Close of closed channel  -  by @hshpy in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7580 (33188)
  • permission:
  • Enhance the strictness of permissions (#7705 close #7680)  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7705 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7680 (48916)
  • s3:
  • Escape CopySource request header when copying files (#7860 close #7858)  -  by @Jason-Fly in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7860 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7858 (99f39)
  • webauthn:
  • Handle error when removing webauthn credential  -  by @huiyifyj in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7689 (5ecf5)
  • workflow:
  • Use the dev version of the web for beta releases  -  by @Lanfei in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7862 (c2633)

   üèé Performance

  • Speed ‚Äã‚Äãof database initialization  -  by @j2rong4cn in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7694 (db992)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for AList: v3.43.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • 115 open driver  -  by @xhofe in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/8139 (3499c)
  • archive:
  • Support deprioritize previewing  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7984 (30d8c)
  • baidu_netdisk:
  • Support dynamical slice size for low bandwith upload case  -  by @ljcbaby in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7965 (25707)
  • bootstrap:
  • Add .url to proxy types  -  by @xrgzs in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7928 (3f9be)
  • ci:
  • Use go-cross/cgo-actions for dev build  -  by @xhofe (f88fd)
  • github:
  • Support github proxy (#7979 close #7963)  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7979 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7963 (36b42)
  • Support GPG verification (#7996 close #7986)  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7996 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7986 (cdc41)
  • github_releases:
  • Support dir size for show all version  -  by @YangRucheng in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7938 (f7958)
  • recursive-move:
  • Advanced conflict policy for preventing unintentional overwriting  -  by @Lanfei in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7906 (b9ad1)
  • traffic:
  • Support limit task worker count & file stream rate  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7948 (3b715)
  • webdav:
  • Support oc:checksums (#8064 close #7472)  -  by @shniubobo in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/8064 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7472 (28b61)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Missing args when using alias driver (#7941 close #7932)  -  by @hshpy in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7941 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7932 (6164e)
  • Potential XSS vulnerabilities  -  by @hshpy in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7923 (c82e6)
  • Missing handling of RangeReadCloser  -  by @hshpy in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/8146 (d20f4)
  • 139:
  • Restore the Account handling, partially reverts #7850 (#7900 close #7784)  -  by @abc1763613206 in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7850, https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7900 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7784 (b9f39)
  • 189pc:
  • Transfer rename  -  by @foxxorcat in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7958 (39933)
  • archive:
  • Decode filename when decompressing zips (#7998 close #7988)  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7998 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7988 (c230f)
  • Use another sign for extraction  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7982 (646c7)
  • baidu_netdisk:
  • Remove duplicate retry  -  by @ljcbaby in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7972 (370a6)
  • cloudreve:
  • Use milliseconds timestamp in last_modified  -  by @xrgzs in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/8133 (5dfea)
  • crypt:
  • Premature close of MFile (#8132 close #8119)  -  by @j2rong4cn in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/8132 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/8119 (0126a)
  • driver:
  • Implement canceling and updating progress for putting for some drivers  -  by @KirCute in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7847 (779c2)
  • febbox:
  • Panic due to slice out of range (#7898 close #7889)  -  by @Jason-Fly in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7898 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7889 (d53ee)
  • feiji:
  • Modify the request header (#7902 close #7890)  -  by @YangRucheng in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7902 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7890 (ec3fc)
  • ilanzou:
  • Add header X-Forwarded-For to solve IP ban  -  by @YangRucheng in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7977 (f25be)
  • index:
  • Fix the issue where ignored paths are not updated  -  by @Lanfei in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7907 (0219c)
  • lang:
  • Initialize configuration in LangCmd before generating language JSON file  -  by @xhofe (d16ba)
  • lenovonas_share:
  • The size of the directory  -  by @YangRucheng in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/7914 (39bde)
  • onedrive:
  • Set req.ContentLength  -  by @xrgzs in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/8081 (7579d)
  • s3:
  • Incorrectly added slash before the Bucket name (#8083 close #8001)  -  by @hisproc in https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/8083 and https://github.com/AlistGo/alist/issues/8001 (04f55)
    View changes on GitHub
